member.name: IMFWorkQueueServicesEx.BeginRegisterPlatformWorkQueueWithMMCSSEx
member.summary: Registers a platform work queue with Multimedia Class Scheduler Service (MMCSS) using the specified class and task id.
member.param: The id of one of the standard platform work queues.
The MMCSS class which the work queue should be registered with.

param.name: dwTaskId
param.code: The task id which the work queue should be registered with. If dwTaskId is 0, a new MMCSS bucket will be created.

member.param: Standard callback used for async operations in Media Foundation.
Standard state used for async operations in Media Foundation.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFWorkQueueServicesEx.GetPlatformWorkQueueMMCSSPriority
member.summary: Gets the priority of the Multimedia Class Scheduler Service (MMCSS) priority associated with the specified platform work queue.
member.param: Topology work queue id for which the info will be returned.
member.returns: Pointer to a buffer allocated by the caller that the work queue's MMCSS task id will be copied to.

member.name: IMFWorkQueueServicesEx.GetTopologyWorkQueueMMCSSPriority
member.summary: Retrieves the Multimedia Class Scheduler Service (MMCSS) string associated with the given topology work queue.
member.param: The id of the topology work queue.
Pointer to the buffer the work queue's MMCSS task id will be copied to.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
